mapper.insert: insert into tb_user(user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, last_edit_time) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime});
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, last_edit_time, total_capacity, used_capacity from tb_user where user_id = #{id};
select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, last_edit_time, total_capacity, used_capacity from tb_user where user_name=#{username};
